name: jss-reset
description: JSS stylesheets to reduce browser defaults inconsistencies.
author: Damiano Barbati <damiano.barbati@gmail.com> (http://github.com/damianobarbati)

scripts.build: yarn build:form & yarn build:typography & yarn build:typography6 & yarn build:reset
scripts.build:form: jss convert src/form.css --format js --export es6 > src/form.js
scripts.build:typography: jss convert src/typography.css --format js --export es6 > src/typography.js
scripts.build:typography6: jss convert src/typography6.css --format js --export es6 > src/typography6.js
scripts.build:reset: jss convert src/reset.css --format js --export es6 > src/reset.js
